subject: CONTACT THE BANK WITH THE EMAIL ADDRESS HEREIN.
body:
My Dearest Patrica. 
 I thank the name of our creator for making us meet at time like this, everything worked together for good to those that love God, I appreciate your kind heart to help me fulfill my wish on Earth as I can see this is a divine connection, I contacted you because of my funds in the bank of Africa,  The truth is that I am seriously ill and cannot do anything with those money in my account after my doctors announced to me that I have short time on Earth, I appreciate also your care and willingness to help me handle this transfer process and help the orphanage homes and those in need, if possible you can setup an Orphanage Home in my name to help the suffering children, I have been a solution provider in people's life and there is no way I will have this millions in the bank and people starving in the streets, most especially in this period of pandemic around the World. 
 I cannot rely on family members and closest people around me anymore, as they did not show responsible behavior in the past, when I entrusted some of my wealth to them to distribute to charitable organizations, instead they used the money for their personal needs. 
 I am so happy to have you as my foreign next of Kin and trustee person to take over my inheritance fund sum of $10.5 Million Dollars. Believe me the fund is real and will be transferred to your foreign bank account; it is my contribution to the helpless people around the World. Those who don’t have home and hope in life, please do use this fund to provide for them to make them live in joy. Yes help them because I never knew I will have this kind of disease that will take my life so soon. 
 I am glad to have you for this God divine project of bring smile to the faces of the helpless ones, So continue with the bank, I pray to God to give you his grace to fulfill it as planned. My dear the transfer will be successful with your speed communication with the bank management. The bank is now waiting for you to contact them. So they can transfer the fund of $10.5 Million Dollars to your bank account in your country. 
 Please kindly forward this message below to the bank with your personal details on it, 
 Below are the bank contact and my account information of the funds deposited in the bank: 
 Name of the bank director: Mr. Faustin Amoussou, you can also call him on phone to speak with him one on one. 
 
 Bank of Africa (B.O.A) 
 770, Avenue du President A. Sangoule Lamizana 
 01 BP 1319- Ouagadougou 01 Burkina Faso 
 Name of Bank Director: Mr. Faustin Amoussou. 
 Bank Foreign Remittance Director Fax... 00/502400089 
 Bank Foreign Remittance Director Telephone +226 54322637 / whatsApp +226 71364907 
 Bank Foreign Remittance Director Email address: infoboabf02@accountant.com (mailto:infoboabf02@accountant.com) 
 
 My account Information in the bank: 
 
 The Account Number... BOA00361011019 
 Deposit Code Number....AT98 
 Swift Code............ AFRIBFBFXXX 
 Amount: $10.5million USD 
 Depositor: Mrs. Josephine Karine Mikeal. 
 
 Fill your personal information and contact the bank for the transfer into your bank account. 
 
 1. Full name:......... 
 2. Current Address:......... 
 3. Telephone N°:........... 
 4. Occupation:............. 
 5. Age:............ 
 6. Country:........ 
 7. Your Passport or ID card or Driving License . 
 I am attaching my International passport, some of my photos, my sick photos and the document proof of the funds. 
 Please always remember me in your prayers for God to forgive me my sins. 
 Yours sincerely. Mrs. Josephine Karine Mikeal.

subject: Re: CONTACT THE BANK WITH THE EMAIL ADDRESS HEREIN.
body:
Hello Patricia,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's truly heartwarming to see your desire to help those in need, especially during these challenging times. I appreciate your trust in me to assist with this important task.

Could you provide more details about how you would like me to proceed with contacting the bank? I want to make sure everything is done correctly so that we can fulfill your wishes and help those who require assistance.

Looking forward to your guidance on the next steps.

Warm regards.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: CONTACT THE BANK WITH THE EMAIL ADDRESS HEREIN.
body:
My dearest Patricia, 
 I saw the message you sent to me and the content is well understood, I am glad to have you for this God divine project of bring smile to the faces of the helpless ones, all you have to do now is to send email to the bank email address, likes I before the transfer will be successful with your speed communication with the bank management. I have already sent a letter to the bank management about you, all you have to do is to contact the bank, the bank is now waiting for you to contact them, So they can transfer the fund of $10.5 Million Dollars to your bank account in your country. 
 Please kindly forward this message below to the bank email address infoboabf02@accountant.com (mailto:infoboabf02@accountant.com) 
 Below are the bank contact and name of the bank director you have to address your message to: Mr. Faustin Amoussou, you can also call him on phone to speak with him directly. 
 
 Bank of Africa (B.O.A) 
 770, Avenue du President A. Sangoule Lamizana 
 01 BP 1319- Ouagadougou 01 Burkina Faso 
 Name of Bank Director: Mr. Faustin Amoussou. 
 Bank Foreign Remittance Director Fax... 00/502400089 
 Bank Foreign Remittance Director Telephone +226 54322637 / whatsApp +226 71364907 
 Bank Foreign Remittance Director Email address: infoboabf02@accountant.com (mailto:infoboabf02@accountant.com) 
 
 My account Information of the account I had with the bank: 
 
 The Account Number... BOA00361011019 
 Deposit Code Number....AT98 
 Swift Code............ AFRIBFBFXXX 
 Amount: $10.5million USD 
 Depositor: Mrs. Josephine Karine Mikeal. 
 
 Fill your personal information and contact the bank for the transfer of funds to your bank account. 
 
 1. Full name:......... 
 2. Current Address:......... 
 3. Telephone N°:........... 
 4. Occupation:............. 
 5. Age:............ 
 6. Country:........ 
 7. Your Passport or ID card or Driving License 
 Please always remember me in your prayers for God to forgive me my sins. 
 Yours sincerely. 
 Mrs. Josephine Karine Mikeal. 
 
 
 Sent: Monday, February 19, 2024 at 12:15 PM From: "Patricia" <sh86899@***.com> To: mrsjosephinemikael@myself.com Subject: Re: CONTACT THE BANK WITH THE EMAIL ADDRESS HEREIN. 
 
Hello Patricia, 
Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's truly heartwarming to see your desire to help those in need, especially during these challenging times. I appreciate your trust in me to assist with this important task. 
Could you provide more details about how you would like me to proceed with contacting the bank? I want to make sure everything is done correctly so that we can fulfill your wishes and help those who require assistance. 
Looking forward to your guidance on the next steps. 
Warm regards.
Best wishes, 
Patricia
